_sText:
Before Commenting, I want to say something: This is a lite version, I removed the lights and some other expensive stuff. This map was made for small servers who couldn't run Surf_Grave_Reloaded. Soon I'll be releasing a second version of SGReloaded with all the stuff back.



------------------------------------------------------
Summary - Surf Grave Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------
Title : Grave Reloaded (Small Version)
Level Name : Surf Grave Reloaded Lite
Filename : surf_grave_reloaded_lite
Version : 2.7l
Release Date : 07/18/2007
Author : Xblah
Email Address : changremista@gmail.com
Web Site : http://www.xblahleveldesigns.tripod.com

------------------------------------------------------
Comments - Surf Grave Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------

This is a complete remake of the original Counter-Strike: Source Surf Grave Final. Betweeen the many changes are:

Reloaded V2 Lite:

Removed Lights (to make the file smaller)
Fixed Weapons Falling
Added Item Defusers
Fixed Water Blocks
Removed Waterfall Effects (to make the file smaller)

Reloaded V1:

Added Displacements
Added Lights
Added Details

------------------------------------------------------
Servers Running - Surf Grave Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------

***Ask for adding your server***

------------------------------------------------------
Installing - Surf Grave Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------

To install the map, open the .zip file and extract all
the files to the directory: ...\cstrike\maps\

------------------------------------------------------
In Game Configuration - Surf Grave Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------

Surf Maps need some diferent configurations. It's the
case of this map. To surf on it, you have to write the
following sentences in the console of your mod:

sv_airaccelerate 100 //For Surfing

------------------------------------------------------
Details - Surf Grave Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------
Game : Counter-Strike: Source
Type : Surf - Bomb Defusing
Recommended Players : 2-64
Mods : CS:S
Description : ---
Known Bugs : None
Construction Time : 1 Day
Editor Used : Hammer WE 4.0
Base Textures : De Cbble

-------------------------------------------------------
